title: Steve Bannon's Road to the White House
description: Joshua Green talks about “Devil’s Bargain”; Alexandria Marzano-Lesnevich discusses “The Fact of a Body”; and Laura Dassow Walls on her new biography of Thoreau.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
